CustomField.description: This field is used for the GeoJSON map in Wave Analytics. The JSON file compares customer records to each town on the map. Each town's identifier is case sensitive. Therefore, all records need an all uppercase city in order for the date to be illustrated correctly - Cole Swain
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is used for the GeoJSON map in Wave Analytics. The JSON file compares customer records to each town on the map. Each town's identifier is case sensitive. Alll records need an all uppercase city in order for the date to be illustrated correctly.
CustomField.label: Billing City (Upper Case)
